text: Took my parents to the local #CHC in Baharagora for their 2nd doze of #CovidVaccine. Our doctors & scientists have worked very hard to fight #COVID19. The #vaccine is totally safe. I request all my friends to do their best to help the eligible ones take it #कोरोनाहारेगादेशजीतेगा https://t.co/KOKthnglXG
